Class Player

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPlayer
    This file holds data members and all the methods which are related to player. This has singleton implementation.

      • reinforcement

        public boolean reinforcement​(java.lang.String countryName,
                             java.lang.Integer numberOfArmies,
                             Graph graphObj,
                             CurrentPlayer currentPlayerObj)
        This method check validation of reinforcements and do reinforce.
        Specified by:
        reinforcement in interface IPlayer
        Parameters:
        countryName - This is n string which specified by user for reinforcement
        numberOfArmies - This is an integer parameter which specify the number of armies for reinforcement
        graphObj - This is an object which pass the game graph.
        currentPlayerObj - This is an object which is current player of the game.
        Returns:
        true(if runs successfully) or false (in case it fails any validation)

      • defenderCommandInput

        public static java.lang.Integer defenderCommandInput​(java.lang.Integer numberOfArmiesDefenderCanSelect,
                                                     java.util.Scanner scanner)
        This handles the command entered by the defender to defend his/her country with the number of armies he/she entered.
        Parameters:
        numberOfArmiesDefenderCanSelect - This is the integer value that a defender is allowed to select the number of armies.
        scanner - This is a scanner to take the command written by the defender as an input.
        Returns:
        an integer value that is the number of armies selected by a defender to defend a country.

      • attackMoveCommand

        public static java.lang.Integer attackMoveCommand​(java.lang.Integer numberOfArmiesDuringLastAttack,
                                                  java.util.Scanner scanner,
                                                  java.lang.Integer numberOfArmiesThatAttackerHave)
        This handles the attackMove command to move the right number of armies from attacker country to defender country when attacker wins the defender country
        Parameters:
        numberOfArmiesDuringLastAttack - This is an integer value that stores number of armies used by the attacker in the las battle and is used for validation.
        scanner - Its a scanner used to take a command as input.
        numberOfArmiesThatAttackerHave - This is an integer value that the attacker have in total in attacker country.
        Returns:
        an integer value that is the number of armies an attacker selected to move to his new owned country.

      • attackMove

        public static boolean attackMove​(Country attackerCountry,
                                 Country defenderCountry,
                                 java.lang.Integer numberOfArmiesToMove)
        This method handles the operation to remove and add the exact number of armies selected by the currentplayer(attacker) to newly owned country.
        Parameters:
        attackerCountry - This is an object for the attacker country.
        defenderCountry - This is an object for the defender country.
        numberOfArmiesToMove - an integer value selected by the attacker to move between countries.
        Returns:
        true(if runs successfully) or false(if fails some validation)

        public boolean normalAttack​(java.lang.String fromCountry,
                            java.lang.String toCountry,
                            java.lang.Integer numDice,
                            Graph graphObj,
                            CurrentPlayer currentPlayerObj)

        toCountry - This is a defenderCountry.

      • battle

        public static boolean battle​(Country attackerCountry,
                             Country defenderCountry,
                             java.lang.Integer attackerArmies,
                             java.lang.Integer defenderArmies,
                             IPlayer attacker,
                             IPlayer defender)
        This method manages the battle between attackerCountry and defenderCountry and declares whoever wins the battle.
        Parameters:
        attackerCountry - object of the country that attacks the other country.
        defenderCountry - object of the country that is attacked.
        attackerArmies - Integer value, number of armies selected by attacker to attack.
        defenderArmies - Integer value, number of armies selected by defender to defend.
        Returns:
        true(if runs successfully)

      • fortify

        public boolean fortify​(java.lang.String fromCname,
                       java.lang.String toCountryName,
                       java.lang.Integer numberOfArmies,
                       Graph gameGraph)
        This allows a player to move any number of armies from his owned country to any of his owned neighbor country, leaving behind at least 1 army unit.
        Specified by:
        fortify in interface IPlayer
        Parameters:
        fromCname - The name of the country from where the armies are to be moved
        toCountryName - The name of the country to which the armies are to be moved
        numberOfArmies - The total number of armies to be moved
        gameGraph - This is an object of the class Graph
        Returns:
        true(If all the conditions are satisfied and the desired country is fortified) or false(If the countries specified are absent or it does not fulfill the requirements)
